forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with some morning fog. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then cloudy this afternoon. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the evening, then cloudy with rain likely overnight. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the evening, overcast overnight with occasional rain. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 54F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
